dr.evomodel.substmodel
Interface SubstitutionModel

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable, Model, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAminoAcidModel, AbstractCodonModel, AbstractCovarionDNAModel, AbstractCovarionModel, AbstractNucleotideModel, AbstractSubstitutionModel, AsymmetricQuadraticModel, BinaryCovarionModel, Coevolve.SitePairSubstitutionModel, ComplexSubstitutionModel, CovarionGTR, CovarionHKY, EmpiricalAminoAcidModel, EmpiricalCodonModel, GeneralF81Model, GeneralSubstitutionModel, GLMSubstitutionModel, GTR, HKY, HKYRates, LinearBiasModel, MicrosatelliteModel, MsatBMA, MutationDeathModel, NewMicrosatelliteModel, NtdBMA, OnePhaseModel, PCACodonModel, PositiveDefiniteSubstitutionModel, SubstitutionEpochModel, SVSComplexSubstitutionModel, SVSGeneralSubstitutionModel, TN93, TwoPhaseModel, TwoStateCovarionModel, YangCodonModel
public interface SubstitutionModel
extends Model

model of sequence substitution (rate matrix). provides a convenient interface for the computation of transition probabilities

Version:
$Id: SubstitutionModel.java,v 1.13 2005/05/24 20:25:58 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
